name: bot_s
description: creating a virtual environment ``` python -m venv venv ``` launch virtual environment in cmd (windows) ``` venv\Scripts\activate ``` install all the necessary dependencies from requirements ``` pip install -r requirements.txt ``` bot launch ``` python newbot.py ``` server start open another terminal and in it we write the command ``` python server.py ``` ## for development information about the bot is in the file "info_information.txt"
